body.div: $i.$ fyrst tyme that I was movyd to pot up ony artekyll was
abowte avent by serlys at home with me
$2.$ what communicacion that I had with serlys of palme sonday hit
dothe apere in my boke of my fyrst answer to my lordes grace
$3.$ also what serlys sayde to london I have also notyd in my former
byll he chyd for altereng of them. & that was the casse he sent
for the same artekylles beyng at home In his purse.
even in palmeson weke of schyre thorsday or good fryday as
$4.$ i thenke I came home & tolde garner & asched for the wrytyng

div.at: at serlys sent for & salsbere colde not befonde & efter dener gardiner callyd me In to the

body.div: gardyn & deleverde me the oder wryttyng & bad me schow
them to master london & to my lorde of venchester bot
schether copyde them owt fyrst in order & I toke themÂ
& sayde my lorde scholde have them & I lette london se them
& so forthe as I have sayde be fore in my oder wrytyng
$5.$ what I dyd with the coppie I dyd kypp hit styll my selffe
$n$ $6.$ wher I schoyde the boke to my lorde of venchester or no
schetheres man caryd hit to my lorde hym selffe I went with
hym my selffe my lorde had no laser to loke on hit & so I keppte
it to ther comyng to london & thay resayvyd hit of me agane
$7.$ ther was never none gave me seche comforde oder
then I had of master london & of my lorde of venchester
as I have schowyde be fore also
$8.$ I never sayde that the consell gave me ane comforde
bot that london tolde me that I scholde have meche
thanke bot all this his to exskewse them selves bot and hyffe
thay had had comforde as I know none thay had scholde
thay ther apon In vent false maters apon any man
how scholde hit stonde to geder or with reson that thay dyd this be
comfort of ony bode when thay had all rede drawn
or ever I spake with them or come downe bot falsodewoll ever
have afoolle hende
